text:
This is for the C++ library version 1
The signature node always has new lines after each child node.
This should be something that can be switched on or off.
creator: vincent.finn@automsoft.com

text:
Vincent,

Have just checked in an update to the code, with a method
DSIGSignature::setPrettyPrint(bool)

By default this is set to on, but by calling setPrettyPrint(false) on a given
DSIGSignature object, you can now disable output of NLs.

Cheers,
    Berin
creator: berin@ozemail.com.au
